TEXT.TITLE: UBS UNIT ISSUES 15 BILLION YEN EUROBOND
TEXT.BODY: Union Bank of Switzerland NV is issuing a 15 billion yen eurobond due June 1, 1992 paying 4-3/8 pct and priced at 101-3/8 pct, lead manager Union Bank of Switzerland (Securities) Ltd said. The issue has a call option and put option after four years at par and is guaranteed by Union Bank of Switzerland. The selling concession is one pct while management and underwriting combined pays 5/8 pct. The issue is available in denominations of one mln yen and will be listed in Luxembourg. The payment date is June 1. REUTER
